The reason I bought this is because of thr word enamel protection as my mom had issues with her enamel.4 brushes for Ra.240 is definitely the real price and in my opinion I won't think it as a buy 2 get 2 free marketing. The price is on the higher end of it's really a buy 2 get 2.The pink color is repetitive. I wish all 4 tooth brush had different colors and a tad darker than current one as current one in morning light looks very pale.The brush is definitely very soft and extra wide. The extra wide is helping cleaning all sides of the teeth better and is also not harsh.But in all the new series of colgate tooth brushes like the extra foam, enamel protection series am seeing a couple of bristles at the bottom end of the brush head in a slanting position or bend at angle, I see it might be a manufacturing issue. Out of 4 brushes 2 had this issue where 3 or 4 bristles were not straight.The density is good enough and all bristles had good thin edges.Overall a good toothbrush but pricing is high, colors could have been different and all bristles should be straight

I am writing this review after using this variant of Toothbrush for approximately 2 months. Obviously purchased these after seeing 4.5 rating for this product, but there is nothing special about this toothbrush for sure.* This brush is supposed to have Ultra-Soft bristles, which are usually advised to people with sensitivity in their mouth, in my experience, the bristles were medium-soft and as you start to use them down the week, they turn to medium. I tried to clear up the residue by soaking the bristles in baking soda, but sadly this did not happen. So please don't fall prey to false advertising, this brush has medium-soft bristles.* The product claims to be gentle on gums but owing to the above reason, I don't see how this is possible.* The bristles are arranged in plateau layout or simply arranged in a flat with no raised bristles at the tip of the toothbrush which makes it impossible to clean the hard to reach places of your upper molars, this means if you are using this brush, forget about getting 100% clean teeth. I could actually feel a plaque build-up in places where I knew the bristles are not able to reach.* The neck of the toothbrush is not flexible enough, even cheap toothbrushes have better maneuvering than this toothbrush.* This toothbrush just looks fancy but sadly it did not work for me as of yet!Giving it 1 star for the build quality.
